title: I can install my trainer on 6 devices!
content:
woohoo! i just bought myself a christmas present, one of the [spiffy trainers from House 33](http://web.archive.org/web/20120329124532/http:/store.house33.com/index.php?page=clothing&id=54&category=sweaters#54). the best part, i can install it on 6 devices:  
`
Product ····················· Devices Qty Price Extended
----------------------------- ------- --- ----- --------
House·Industries·Trainer ·········· 6 · 1 ·XXX.00 XXX.00
----------------------------- ------- --- ----- --------
········································· Shipping: X.00
···································· Grand Total: XXX.00
`  
does that mean that i can let up to 5 other people borrow it when i'm not wearing it???

(it's a pity that typophile deletes all my extra spaces so i had to use middots)
author: paul d hunt

comments.content:
Paul,

If you use ` ` instead of middots, you get  
`
Product                       Devices Qty Price Extended
----------------------------- ------- --- ----- --------
House Industries Trainer            6   1  XXX.00 XXX.00
----------------------------- ------- --- ----- --------
                                          Shipping: X.00
                                     Grand Total: XXX.00
`  
which looks fine on my mac.  
I just globally replaced middots with ` `.

Michel

Wait. You have \*two\* feet. This means that you can only share your shoes with two other people. Knowing EULAs, the two people would have to be in the same location. This means that you can only share your shoes with Sparky and Scoots. But if they have different shoe sizes, modification may require an additional license.

heh. the trainer is a sweater, dan. :^p  
or should i say "jumper"?
